jiniwa manawa himikam pilibanda lankawa sambandhawa yojanawa sakas karanna lankawen dayaka wanne mangala samarawira ha wijayadasa rajapaksha amathiwarun dedena bawath me dedena dakune minissu nisa dakune aya wana mahinda rajapaksha ha gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathwarun amaruwe damimata ida nodena bawata agamathi ranil wikramasinha mahatha pereda (27 da) madhya aayathana pradhanin hamu wu awasthawedi kara thibena prakashayata pilithuru demin gammanpila mahatha me bawa pawasiya. 2008 di koti thrasthawadaya parajaya kirimata hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha ha hitapu aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathwarun dawantha yuddhayaka niyali sitiyadi koti paradana aanduwa ayawayen parajaya kirimata aanduwe sita wipakshayata giya thidenagen dedenaku wuye mowun bawath hethema sihipath kaleya.
